entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
